casebody.data:
No. 65130 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MAY 05, 2017

WESTGATE PLANET HOLLYWOOD LAS VEGAS, LLC; Westgate Resorts, Ltd.; Liberty Mutual Insurance Company; Fidelity and Deposit Company of Maryland; and Westchester Fire Insurance Company, Appellants/Cross-Respondents,
v.
TUTOR-SALIBA CORPORATION; National Union Fire Insurance Company of Pittsburgh, PA; Travelers Casualty and Surety Company of America, Respondents/Cross-Appellants.

AFFIRMED IN PART, REVERSED IN PART AND VACATED IN PART, AND REMAND.
